DOC.brief_title: Impact Unrestrictive Exercise Following Mid-Urethral Sling Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Over last decade , mid-urethral sling become new gold standard management stress urinary incontinence high success rate minimally invasive nature . However , postoperative management keep pace modernization sling surgery . Although formal guideline regard resumption normal activity level establish , general practice restrict exercise minimum six week surgery . For study , immediate resumption normal activity impact intermediate- long-term continence outcome , may result improve quality life cost saving societal perspective .
DOC.criteria: Nonpregnant female Selfreported stress urinary incontinence Incontinence demonstrate physical exam and/or urodynamics study Planned midurethral sling surgery Available 2 year followup Willing able complete study assessment per judgment treat clinician Willing able provide write informed consent Age < 18 year time enrollment Concomitant prolapse surgery anterior colporrhaphy Currently pregnant < 12 month postpartum Unable read , write , comprehend English
